builder().Description: Creates a builder for assembling a @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatchConfig_E@.

Parameters: exclusive bitmask for exclusive roles for the player. The exclusive bitmask of each pairing of players must equal zero for auto-match.
createAutoMatchCriteria(int, int, long).Description: Creates an auto-match criteria Bundle. Can be passed to @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMultiplayer#createMatch_E@ to create a match for a turn-based game.
createAutoMatchCriteria(int, int, long).FullName: public static Bundle createAutoMatchCriteria (int minAutoMatchPlayers, int maxAutoMatchPlayers, long exclusiveBitMask)

Returns: The criteria for auto-matching one or more players for the match.
getAutoMatchCriteria().Description: Retrieves the criteria for auto-matching one or more players for the match.

Returns: The player IDs to invite to the match.
getInvitedPlayerIds().Description: Retrieves the player IDs to invite to the match.

ClassDesc: Configuration for creating a new turn-based match.
